turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to check my account balance. Can you help?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! To access your account information, I'll need you to verify your identity. Please provide your full name and the last four digits of your social security number.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, my name is John Smith and the last four digits are 1234. Now can you tell me my balance?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, John. Your current balance is $2,345.67. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Actually, yes. I'm a bit confused. I saw a charge on my account yesterday from 'XYZ Corp' for $100, but I don't remember making that purchase. How can I find out more about that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your concern. Unfortunately, I don't have the capacity to provide transaction details beyond what you can see on your statement. I suggest you contact customer service directly at 555-1212 during their operating hours to inquire about the charge. They will have more detailed information and can assist with any disputes. Apologies, I know it's not a perfect solution.
